definitions.definition: Whose arrival is a cause of joy ; received with gladness; admitted willingly to the house, entertainment, or company.
examples: Refugees are welcome in our city!
a welcome turn of events; welcome news

definitions.definition: Followed by to : free to have or enjoy gratuitously .
examples: You are welcome to the use of my library.

main_definition: Whose arrival is a cause of joy ; received with gladness; admitted willingly to the house, entertainment, or company.
secondary_definitions: Followed by to : free to have or enjoy gratuitously .
